definitions.definition: To rotate inside a monowheel or similar apparatus due to sudden acceleration or braking .
To insert a small animal (typically a gerbil, supposedly) into one's rectum (a sexual practice in urban myth ).

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To rotate inside a monowheel or similar apparatus due to sudden acceleration or braking .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , slang ) To insert a small animal (typically a gerbil, supposedly) into one's rectum (a sexual practice in urban myth ).
